00147     inline double&  operator()(long i1)
00148 
00149 {
00150 
00151 #ifndef _NO_BOUNDS_CHECK_
00152 
00153     long ia, ib;
00154 
00155     if(Structure[1].getIndexCount() != 1)
00156 
00157     {ia = i1; ib = Structure[2].getIndexBase();}
00158 
00159     else
00160 
00161     {ia = Structure[1].getIndexBase(); ib = i1;}
00162 
00163     CAMvectorBase::indexCheck(Structure,ia,ib);
00164 
00165 #endif
00166 
00167     long* beginPtr = Structure.indexBeginBase.getDataPointer();
00168 
00169 
00170 
00171     double* dataPtr =  (double*)DataP->dataPointer;
00172 
00173     long offset = (i1 - *(beginPtr));
00174 
00175     return *(dataPtr + offset);
00176 
00177 }
